_sText:
UPDATE: i'm remaking this map from scratch

HERE IS THE REALESES OF ze_JurassicPark_Escape_v1

Sorry for putting you all though those painful beta testing 1 & 2
map is now stable so here is the v1. 
this v1 is a huge improvment from the b2. has loads more features improvements etc listed below 

Added/NewFeatures/fixes to v1 (That were not in the beta2)

* Added a secret but its a secret :P (you can get a HEsmoke that leaves a trail)
* now far harder to camp the small island
* Added a new c4 defend point!
* textures improved/overlays
* new custom skybox texture
* incresed fps (fixed error in the corner of screen)
* Fixed being able get out the map by surfing up a displacment
* faster nuke imbond time 
* changed the phone to a light that changes from red to green
* improved heli pad looks
* added more console heli inbond 60 sec 30sec so on so on..
* now must defend loading bay for longer (improved box area for simple defending)
* both way 1 and 2 are now the same time taken
* fixed being able to get on an invisable barrier and that skip out some of the level
* added nests for the raptors
* removed fog completly
* added boxes around helipad for better defence
* changed water to dx70 for faster fps
* extended the lengh of the map by around 30seconds


* i made this map becasue of the loss of butterknifes jurassic park. the fix realsed did not realy work to well therefore i have realsed this map instead. has many of the great features from his version now in mine. please note that this is my first zombie escape map EVER!

* please check out the jurassic-life mod for halflife 2
www.jurassic-life.game-lab.com/

* Report bugs to by youtube channel thegregster101
